ygData.subject: Re: players getting charmed
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I tried this ONCE, so it might not be consistent. I charmed a Gnoll Embalmer that had a pet (did not get a fail message, so I assume it worked) and the
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I tried this ONCE, so it might not be consistent. I charmed a Gnoll
Embalmer that had a pet (did not get a fail message, so I assume it worked)
and the pet and all his buddies attacked me. BTW, those damn Embalmers have
some NASTY spells!

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Brewhaus [mailto:brewhaus@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 7:47 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: players getting charmed
>
>
> From: Brewhaus <brewhaus@...>
>
> Does anyone know what happens if you charm an NPC with a pet? Or if you
> get charmed while you have a pet? Just curious.
>
> Aarreran
